definition: see 月氏[Yue4 zhi1] and 閼氏|阏氏[yan1 zhi1]

sentences.english: A woman, after marriage, usually drops her surname and takes that of her husband.
sentences.chinese: 女人在婚后往往去掉自己的姓氏而冠以夫姓。

sentences.english: The process is named for Louis Pasteur, its originator.
sentences.chinese: 首创者是巴斯德，并以其姓氏命名。

sentences.english: Shall I write your given or family name first ?
sentences.chinese: 先写您的名字还是姓氏好呢？

sentences.english: The Jamo name was created using the first two letters of their surnames.
sentences.chinese: 该尊宝的名字是使用他们的姓氏前两个字母。

sentences.english: Lori does not want her last name used.
sentences.chinese: 洛瑞不希望公布她的姓氏。

sentences.english: However, it is hard to research his life age due to uncertain family name.
sentences.chinese: 姓氏的不确定，也就难以考证他的生卒年。

sentences.english: The first surname is the paternal.
sentences.chinese: 第一个姓氏必须是父亲的姓氏。

sentences.english: The first surname is the paternal.
sentences.chinese: 第一个姓氏必须是父亲的姓氏。

sentences.english: What could possibly explain this weird phenomenon, which the study authors dubbed "the last-name effect"?
sentences.chinese: 研究人员将这种现象叫做做“姓氏效应”。

sentences.english: I understand that Rosalie likes to keep her own last name.
sentences.chinese: 我知道罗莎莉想要保留她自己原本的姓氏。

sentences.english: Lalique was a name of a French artist.
sentences.chinese: 莱俪曾经是一位法国艺术家的姓氏。

sentences.english: Later, in his reply in that their professional and family names.
sentences.chinese: 后来，他在回复的信息里道明了自己的专业和姓氏。

sentences.english: She can use her maiden name only for private purposes.
sentences.chinese: 她只能在私人场合使用自己娘家的姓氏。

sentences.english: The author index has entries arranged in alphabetical order of author's surnames.
sentences.chinese: 著者索引中有按著者姓氏字母顺序排列的著录。

sentences.english: Surnames carry some history in that they give an indication of our ethnic origins.
sentences.chinese: 姓氏名包含了他们象征种族起源的来历。

sentences.english: Like many surnames, Louis Pasteur's probably once indicated a profession.
sentences.chinese: 像很多姓氏一样，巴斯德的姓氏在过去暗指专业。

definition: two-character surname such as 司馬|司马 or 諸葛|诸葛
The Book of Family Names, anonymous Song dynasty reading primer listing 438 surnames
Guoxing or Kuohsing township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
to bestow a surname (of emperor conferring favor on ethnic group)
